title: Australia to pay hundreds of millions in reparations to Indigenous 'stolen generations'
content:
1. Australia to pay hundreds of millions in reparations to Indigenous 'stolen generations'  The Washington Post
  2. Australia to establish $280 million reparations fund for 'Stolen Generation'  CNN
  3. Some Indigenous Australians to receive reparations  Reuters
  4. Australia’s ‘Stolen Generations’: ‘Heroin use hid the pain’  Al Jazeera English
  5. Australia pledges hundreds of millions in reparations to Indigenous 'Stolen Generation'  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オーストラリア、先住民の「盗まれた世代」に数億円の賠償金を支払うことに
澳大利亚将向土著 "被偷走的几代人 "支付数以亿计的赔偿金
澳大利亞將向土著 "被偷走的幾代人 "支付數以億計的賠償金
